ygData.subject: Re: Web Page Update
ygData.msgSnippet: For those of you so badly in need of good web site for EQ that need to see them in a purely Blacksmithing Forum These are the best sites the net has to offer,
ygData.messageBody:
For those of you so badly in need of good web site for EQ that need to see
them in a purely Blacksmithing Forum

These are the best sites the net has to offer, if it isn't here it isn't
anywhere

http://www.eqvault.com/
http://eq.stratics.com/
http://everquest.gamestats.com/
http://gameznet.com/eq/

Be warned to the last 2 of these site have allot of spoilers and such that
may ruin your gaming experience, use as you see fit.

This is all I have to say about this web page deal now. We are all the
level and we all have the same web sites to check out.

-=Ailenu=-
-----Original Message-----
From: ddashefsky@... [mailto:ddashefsky@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 05, 1999 8:26 AM
To: EQ_Blacksmiths@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Blacksmiths] Web Page Update


From: ddashefsky@...



Actually, the web page that was updated contains some very good
blacksmithing information. You'd be surprised how many of these home pages
contain wonderful exclusive information. I for one welcome notification of
updates.. that's frequently the only way you'd hear of some of these
excellent small sites. That site in particular has excellent info on how
to get your smithing skill into the banded armor range... I highly
recommend it.

Geran
Magician (and Smith) of Povar
